page.title: 17An Ordinary Day in My Life
page.content: On a school day I get up at 07:30. I get dressed and ready for school. Then at 08:45 my dad takes my brothers and me to Blackdown First and Middle School. School finishes at 15:00 then my dad comes and picks us up again. When I get home to Deepcut Village I usually get changed and peel potatoes for my dad to make into chips to sell in his takeaway. After tea at 16:30 I go out to see my friends. At 18:00 I go home in case my dad needs help before he opens up at 18:30. Then I go out again to see my mum who lives on the army camp with her second husband. At 20:00 I go home, do my homework, then at about 21:30 I switch my light out and go to sleep.
